constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 86 (Thursday, May 19, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PFLUGER:
H.R. 7851.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United Sates
Constitution
[Page H5208]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to disclose certain ties to China-affiliated organizations, and for other purposes.
